Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.summary: fabric-test CI daily tests failing due to FAB-6271
Issue.description: chaincodes.feature tests for FAB-5790 parts 3 and 4, have been failing in the fabric-test CI daily runs for many days. We need to disable them for now, and keep this open so we can reuse this to reenable them later after FAB-6271 is fixed.
